resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/158561</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158561</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2876</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">At the Shopping Mall</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Am Einkaufen-Mall</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Au centre commercial</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">No mall de shopping</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Al Centro commerciale di shopping</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στη λεωφόρο αγορών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En la alameda de compras</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A lesson plan for an activity where students design and write an advertisement based on a written description from a brochure advertising a shop at a mall. Includes assessment rubric and actual examples.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">advertisement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">language</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Lektionplan für eine Aktivität, in der 
Kursteilnehmer eine Reklameanzeige konzipieren und schreiben, die auf 
einer schriftlichen Beschreibung von einer Broschüre basiert, die ein
System an einem Mall bekanntmacht. Schließt 
Einschätzung Rubrik und tatsächliche Beispiele ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un plan de leçon pour une activité où les 
étudiants conçoivent et écrivent une publicité basée sur une 
description écrite d'une brochure annonçant un système à un mail. 
Inclut la rubrique d'évaluation et les exemples réels.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma planta da lição para uma atividade onde os 
estudantes projetem e escrevam uma propaganda baseada em uma 
descrição escrita de um folheto que anuncia uma loja em um mall. 
Inclui o rubric da avaliação e exemplos reais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un programma di lezione per un'attività dove gli 
allievi progettano e scrivono una pubblicità basata su una 
descrizione scritta da un opuscolo che fa pubblicità ad un negozio ad
un centro commerciale. Include la rubrica di valutazione e gli esempi 
reali.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα σχέδιο μαθήματος για μια δραστηριότητα όπου οι 
σπουδαστές σχεδιάζουν και γράφουν μια διαφήμιση βασισμένη σε μια 
γραπτή περιγραφή από ένα φυλλάδιο διαφημιστικός ένα κατάστημα 
σε μια λεωφόρο. Περιλαμβάνει τη ρουμπρίκα αξιολόγησης και τα
πραγματικά παραδείγματα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un plan de la lección para una actividad donde 
los estudiantes diseñan y escriben un anuncio basado en una 
descripción escrita de un folleto que anuncia un departamento en una 
alameda. Incluye la rúbrica del gravamen y ejemplos reales.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reklameanzeige</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension de lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression écrite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">publicité</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">langage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compreensão da leitura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">propaganda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">língua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comprensione della lettura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione scritta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">pubblicità</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">linguaggio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κατανόηση ανάγνωσης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραπτή έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διαφήμιση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γλώσσα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">comprensión de la lectura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">expresión escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">anuncio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">lenguaje</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
